website_summaries.verdict: These organic baby food purees are made with all-natural ingredients and are easy for your child to eat on the go.
cons: The texture tends to be a little watery, and some of the flavors can be a bit sour

customer_reviews.title: mold/fungus inside our packages
customer_reviews.text: we ordered Plum Organics baby food pouches and when we opened the boxes, it was one of the most disgusting things ive ever seen. All of the pouches were moldy and there was literally a fungus growing inside the boxes. this would not be acceptable to give our son
customer_reviews.author: Laela Benton

customer_reviews.title: **UPDATED- EXPIRED NEXT MONTH DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: *** UPDATE ON BOTTOM *** I bought these for my 7 month old daughter Friday. I recieved my package today (Monday) and I am very disappointed because these expire on July 23, 2019. I know these aren't expired, but what if I would have ordered a couple boxes? Plus 1 month isn't that much time for a 7month old to eat 12 pouches of one flavor of food.. ***UPDATE BELOW*** My daughter is now 9 months old and I figured I would try these again. THEY EXPIRE IN LESS THAN TWO MONTHS. I'M NOT BUYING THESE EVER AGAIN. * also these were NOT a warehouse deal. I know the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Stay at home mom

customer_reviews.title: Pea, pear, spinach formula changed with new packaging as of Fall 2018
customer_reviews.text: Along with the recent packaging change, they also changed the recipe for the pea pear spinach pouch and now our daughter refuses to eat them. At first I thought she just didn't like the packaging change, but comparing nutrition info they are indeed different. The old version had 70 calories and 9g sugar. New one is 60 calories and 6g sugar. Same listed ingredients so they likely cut back on the pear puree and upped the veggies. On the one hand I like that there is less sugar, however on the other hand now she doesn't eat them at all so I would call that a net loss.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality/flavor product but very poor Amazon fulfillment
customer_reviews.text: My 8-month-old son loves all the Plum Organics pouches, so I would highly recommend these pouches for early eaters. However, they are fulfilled by Amazon, and I have encountered issues with the fulfillment twice. The first time was very bad - I received 2 packages of expired products. The labels on the boxes and the pouches showed expired dates. The second time, I ordered 2 different flavors (6-pack each) but received 12 pouches of 1 flavor. I gave feedback to Amazon both times. BE CAREFUL and DOUBLE CHECK the expiration dates!!
customer_reviews.author: uramaki

customer_reviews.title: Good snack
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this flavor! I only use these pouches when we are traveling or on the go (trying to be more environmentally friendly). I like that this blend is a good veggie/fruit ratio! I love Plum Organics, can't wait to try out more flavors.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Great to throw in the diaper bag just in case we need it quickly while we out. My son loves this flavor, so we were so glad when it came in a large quantity! We love that it is super healthy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle h.

customer_reviews.title: Good but strong flavor
customer_reviews.text: I gave one to my 2 year old who immediately gagged when he tried it. The spinach and pea flavor is a bit strong for kids that might be sensitive to things like that. I personally thought it was good but totally get why my kid doesn't like it lol. So i will be finishing these up and ordering another flavor for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This brand is her favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old reliably loves these pouches. They're a life saver for the moment, as she completely rejects being fed with a spoon, is still (slowly but surely) working on feeding herself with a spoon, and turns her nose up at most finger foods. Plus she recently figured out how to hold these herself, which means I can actually eat while she's eating. This brand is her favorite so far, with the pear/pea/spinach and pear/purple carrot/blueberry being her faves. The purple carrot one is totally yummy - I can see why she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Riain

customer_reviews.title: Two weeks from expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks from expiration date. That would have been nice to know before I ordered three cases "not eligible for returns". Baby has a big appetite, but it looks like Mountain Jim will be getting some extra pears and peas to supplement the elk steaks...
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Jim

customer_reviews.title: A good dose of veggies
customer_reviews.text: Darn these Plum Organics folks. They make these great veggie pouches and now, we're completely sucked into buying them for our kids. They've got a lot of yummy flavors but it makes me feel a little big better to buy the ones with some vegetables in it. This one, compared to others (like the Broccoli or Zucchini ones) seems to be the least offensive for my kids. When they are hungry, they'll down one of these in a jiffy. The fastest $1.50 spent. Luckily, with the Subscribe and Save and extra discount, it makes it a little more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tang

customer_reviews.title: Baby enjoys this soft, creamy food
customer_reviews.text: Started using these when the baby was 6.5 months old. The color is a kind of army green when opened, not a bright pea green I was expecting. The baby enjoys eating these. We put this in a bowl and spoon feed her. Now at 8.5 months, we have fed her by squeezing, a bit at a time, in her mouth when we are away from home and a bowl and spoon are not as convenient. She wants to do it herself but she does not have full control of how hard she squeezes it so Mom will do that for now!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy81

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go
customer_reviews.text: We love these pouches for on-the-go snacks. Before leaving for vacation I decided to buy in bulk instead of one-by-one at Target. If you use Subscribe & Save, it's the best deal around. Always check the ingredients and nutrition information, of course! Some varieties have far more sugar (not added, though) than others. And some have more preferable ingredients than others, despite what the given flavor name might be.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy-peasy (spinach & pear) baby feeding
customer_reviews.text: As a grandmother of 3 little ones, I'm delighted with this product. The one who's currently enjoying this loves holding onto and feeding himself out of the pouch and usually gets his veggies this way. He was annoyed when we tried to feed him with a spoon as, at the age of one today (!) he's trying to be his own man. I love this product for it's organic, non-GMO nutrition, as well as the ease with which it feeds him. I only wish these would have been around when my own children were babies!
customer_reviews.author: Mamazabakaka

customer_reviews.title: New packaging, new taste.
customer_reviews.text: The formula and taste changed on this pouch! I thought it was just a re-packaging or rebranding because the list of ingredients remain the same. However, my son (who has been eating this for a couple years, complained about a difference in the taste. So I checked the nutritional information on the label and the amount sugar has decreased. I believe that’s what changed the taste? So weird. Maybe they changed the amount of pear and thus decreased the sugar???
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a picky toddler!
customer_reviews.text: We don't feed our daughter many prepared foods like this, however, when she fails to eat the vegetables I prepare for dinner, she sucks one of the spinach, lead and pear blends down every time. I like the ingredients; I like that nasty stuff isn't in the ingredients. We buy these regularly from Amazon and have never had a problem with the quality or expiration dates. We highly recommend the spinach, peas and pear blend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids love these, and I love that they're organic, convenient and reasonably priced compared to some other brands. It's a bit of a bummer that they're mostly fruit, but I understand that fruit is easier to preserve, so it's not really the fault of the company. I just make sure to make my own vegetables for when I'm home with the kids and use these when we're out at about.
customer_reviews.author: FBlair

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old who hates green foods loves these
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my 2 year old son who refuses to eat anything green. I always have to hide his greens, but these are excellent when I'm too busy or tired or lazy. He loves them and is pretty picky about vegetables. I always keep a box on hand, I get them through subscribe and save and think it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nolla

customer_reviews.title: and after tasting it so as not to waste it I can't blame her
customer_reviews.text: My oldest won't touch this, and after tasting it so as not to waste it I can't blame her. But if your baby doesn't mind the consistency or flavor...its not so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very healthy and easy!
customer_reviews.text: my son absolutely loves these! totally organic and just vegetables and fruit. he's been drinking them since he was around ten months old and still gets his nutrients that way...and he's three and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good balance
customer_reviews.text: This is a good one to use for "sneaky" recipes for the older ones and get in the veggies. The spinach and peas aren't too overpowering and can hide fairly easily when making muffins and such. Otherwise the baby likes it too =).
customer_reviews.author: GAMS Mommy

customer_reviews.title: toddler loves it
customer_reviews.text: my toddler loves it (along with 5-6 other flavors). She even recognizes the external cardboard box in which these boxes arrive as her food and wants to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wasted a lot of money on this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I wasted a lot of money on this stuff. Sometimes he would eat it, but most times no. It's gritty and weird and definitely didn't look appetizing to me. I just started giving him cooled steamed veggies instead.
customer_reviews.author: amiee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: You don’t need a spoon so it perfect on the go
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old son loves these pouches. He holds them to his mouth and drinks them like a smoothie. I have tasted most of the favors and they are all great. My nanny has actually started buying them for herself to eat as a snack. It's nice to know he is getting his veggies and loving them. The Plum price point is great compared to other organic brands.
customer_reviews.author: New Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love plum organics and my daughter does too. I buy the entire line. She loves them all and this one is one of her favorites. I can't say enough good things about this company. The only thing I do wish, is that Amazon would sell there products a little cheaper. At least make it comparable to your local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: jessica b

customer_reviews.title: and it's a great way to get him to eat greens
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old son loves this flavor, and it's a great way to get him to eat greens. It's a lovely way to feed him when we're very busy as well and don't have time to set up a proper meal. It's also great to use in addition to other foods or as a snack.
customer_reviews.author: S Dods

customer_reviews.title: Good most of the time, but big time quality control issue!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this about 8 times, but the last batch included at least one punctured pouch, and all the other pouches were covered in goo. :-( I had to throw them all out bc I couldn't figure out which ones were punctured.
customer_reviews.author: ashandjenn

customer_reviews.title: Good food, but received a different variety than ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 12 pack of spinach and received a variety pack instead. Disappointing since my baby doesn’t like the other varieties, but the food itself is fine.
customer_reviews.author: not_a_bunny

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this one. It is a perfect combination baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A

customer_reviews.title: Veggies (and fruit) kids will eat
customer_reviews.text: While I feel guilty for all of the plastic waste, this is the only way we get green veggies into my kids stomachs, so I’m hooked.
customer_reviews.author: SSCA

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed by our little one!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the one that actually eats them, but I know our child enjoys this flavor! So far this brand seems to have great combinations of flavors and the products are as expected.
customer_reviews.author: amb123

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered pear, spinach and peas and received two boxes of just prunes :(
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tobar

customer_reviews.title: My kid likes it.
customer_reviews.text: My kid likes it. She's been eating this one for a couple years now.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and nutricious. Its the only fruit blend i ...
customer_reviews.text: Yummy and nutricious. Its the only fruit blend i will give to my LO. All the others are pure sugar, fruit sugar but sugar non the less.
customer_reviews.author: johann cuellar

customer_reviews.title: Love that I can buy in bulk
customer_reviews.text: I bring a variety of these each week to my son's daycare and am so glad I can get them in bulk for the same price I get them in the store or cheaper. I don't buy them for prices although price seems fair. I buy for convenience and baby loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Gtown Mama

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is not a huge fan of veggies, ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is not a huge fan of veggies, but she loves these pouches. It makes including some veggies in her diet much much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... son loves the combo of pears and spinach so easy way to get veggies in him
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the combo of pears and spinach so easy way to get veggies in him. Great price with subscribe and save: $1.08 each versus $1.25 in stores.
customer_reviews.author: BrookeP

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These pouches are so convenient and have this flavor has the highest vitamin a content of all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Have bought a few times now!
customer_reviews.text: I like this flavor way better than the other variety I tried of this brand. Sometimes my children eat it and sometimes I do, when I'm in a hurry. I like that there is a veggie mixed in and not just fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G.

customer_reviews.title: Baby enjoys this product!
customer_reviews.text: Baby eats it so I give it 5 stars!! Sweet but also a bit grainy so I'm hoping it's not all just pears! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sheila S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all organic ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all organic ingredients. Kosher too-ou. Flavor ok-ie purchased for adult w digestive issues-prefer not so fruity. Probably great for babies. Very convenient take along 1serving packs.
customer_reviews.author: H.j.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for Plum stage 2
customer_reviews.text: This is perhaps our favorite flavor from Plum Organics. Our twin girls like the taste and they get some veggies. In general, we love the stage/level 2 blends from Plum. There is a great variety and most of them have worked out really well for our girls. It's super convenient, particularly when we are away from home. Just a tip, make sure to buy a spoon attachment (like the one from Boon) for a really convenient setup. We haven't been quite a lucky with Stage 3, and the world blends are not very kid friendly.
customer_reviews.author: d808Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: my kid loves these
customer_reviews.text: I found this a great way to get greens into my kid. Don't get me wrong, my kid loves greens, it was just easier than cooking them up constantly and freezing them, thawing them, etc. He still eats these at 15 months
customer_reviews.author: Meggypoo

customer_reviews.title: ) I get them to eat one of these for one cookie - not a bad deal.
customer_reviews.text: The only blended food my toddlers will still eat (oddly enough.) I get them to eat one of these for one cookie - not a bad deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy D. Vega

customer_reviews.title: These things are good. My almost one-year-old slurps this flavor down in ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are good. My almost one-year-old slurps this flavor down in no time. I'll be honest - I tasted it myself and agree it is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieK

customer_reviews.title: the good stuff
customer_reviews.text: my LO prefers this flavor over all others. great, easy way to get fruits and veggies into LO's diet.
customer_reviews.author: threadgoddess

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Blend of Fruits and Veggies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a two year old who needs a little extra iron in his diet. He does not like most green vegetables but happily eats this "squeezie." By buying this pack, we are well-supplied and the price is lower per unit than in most super markets.
customer_reviews.author: p shack

customer_reviews.title: Good price, but my 1 and 3 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price, but my 1 and 3 year old girls do not like them very much. They will only eat them if they are really hungry.
customer_reviews.author: turnerm

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: My children love these and I haven't had issues with these like I have other brands. Always quality food with flavors my kids love.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I buy these for my almost 3 year old to ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my almost 3 year old to help her eat more veggies. It's something green that she actually doesn't shy away from at all! The main flavor is pear which is probably why she likes it, but these are a real help at lunchtime when I want her to eat "greens". The only con is the price- but we just make to guard these for ourselves instead of sharing liberally with friends. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to make sure we have enough veggies on ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter eats these nonstop, and we cannot get them at the store. Perfect way to make sure we have enough veggies on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The green pouch
customer_reviews.text: These are a mainstay in our house. My daughter considers them a treat and I like that it helps her get more veggies in her system. These are not really filling, so she sometimes has two.
customer_reviews.author: JollyGreen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My infant and toddler love these! Always a great snack on the go. This is my favorite flavor, because I can be sure that they get some green veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Amie B.

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves this
customer_reviews.text: I have read some reviews in which the parents aren't happy about having apples as one of the ingredients, but I can say that my daughter loves this food and never protests eating it (which is great!). I have even mixed this with some plain peas and was able to spread it over two feedings.
customer_reviews.author: Tambrea McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why but none of the flavors of this brand my son will eat, by far prefers gerbers.
customer_reviews.author: Wednesday lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo wouldnt have any fruits or veggies without these! Always packaged well, always a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Tasty veggies
customer_reviews.text: If your child doesn't like or won't eat vegetables, try this product. It is mixed with fruit and tastes good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves theses. She loves the independence it gives her with feeding herself.
customer_reviews.author: Scott seltzer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor, our 9 month old enjoys and great for meals on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way for my daughter to have a quick snack
customer_reviews.text: Great way for my daughter to have a quick snack. Especially when traveling in the car. Makes for less mess.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Portable Snack
customer_reviews.text: My four and two year old love this. I feel like they're getting their veggies. It's great when we're out and about and they need their daily veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old loves these. So convenient and - I think - healthy! Favorites so far are the Spinach, Peas and Pear and the Blueberry, Pear, and Purple Carrot.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: 10 month loves these. Great flavor and great for traveling. I froze one box while she ate the other so it would stay good. Great buy and will be buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber McDougle

customer_reviews.title: My baby eats it
customer_reviews.text: seems like I'm on the go a lot so this is hand when the baby is fussing and need food like NOW and she likes them he sucks down this food in a min or less but at least it's healthy and that is very important
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L Scott

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: This item was delicious. My daughter actually ate a green food item. Perfectly blended with the pear. Excellent combination. Well Done!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great snack - veggis and fruit.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has thought of these as a "treat" since she was 8 months old. She's now 2 1/2 and still thinks she's getting away with something when I give her one :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it and I only feel good that it has some healthy vegetables in it. It is convenient to carry in the diaper bad on the go too.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this flavor and brand. Great way to get fruit and veggies into a growing toddler. They are great snacks, taste yummy, and perfect for afternoon snack or side dish to dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easiest way to get my kids fed quickly! I don't know why I ever did jars!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love these! My 18 month old eats them everywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved those. One box was missing a pouch though... weird.

customer_reviews.title: My baby LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: After a full year my 1.5yo will not give these up. I'm grateful for a product that is nutritious that she loves.

customer_reviews.title: tastes good
customer_reviews.text: a little green on the way out, but they taste good

customer_reviews.title: baby's favorite flavor!
customer_reviews.text: A great flavor that baby can feed himself. I love it and baby loves it. Highly recommended all organic product.

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this blend by Plum Organics. We buy this one a lot!

customer_reviews.title: good for travel
customer_reviews.text: Babies enjoy feeding themselves with it. Very good for travel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are great but Costco has a better price for the pack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy and nutritious snack!!! Both my 1&2 yr old love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to choice for premade baby food. I love the packaging, making it easy to throw in the diaper bag and pull out whenever needed. I like the ingredients a lot more than similar products. It is just the pureed vegetables and some lemon juice to keep it from spoiling. My kids love it and it is always a treat when we are out and I can grab one. It took them a little while to figure out how to suck it out and I normally have to push up the last of it for the one year olds. Great product, would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CEMom

customer_reviews.title: Twins Love
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get good vitamins & minerals into to little ones. I purchase for twin grandsons and they really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great price, baby loved!
customer_reviews.text: She is just now doing solids and really likes this. I love that plum is non gmo as well. Pouches work so conveniently.
customer_reviews.author: Java&Books

customer_reviews.title: Good food good value
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves these tubes, the great tasting and healthy at a good price and if there is some small amount left over mommy and daddy get a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: to make your baby regular
customer_reviews.text: i love it item for my baby bcuz its organice, it makes my regular price is great. taste is good
customer_reviews.author: arif khan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly our son likes it and eat it all, will by again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New recipe- no apple sauce
customer_reviews.text: Plum Organics is kind of famous for having apple sauce as the first ingredient in most of its veggie blends, no matter what the 'Title' says. And, I bought this particular flavor in the store, and sure enough, the first ingredient was apple puree. However, when I checked the label on my order from Amazon, the first ingredient was pears. And there are no apples listed at all. Glad they've moved to more honest labeling.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Snack
customer_reviews.text: My kids are picky eaters and this is a great way for them to get some vegetables without knowing it.

customer_reviews.text: My grandson (18mo.) will only eat half of this flavor before he realizes its not the applesauce he is used to. I think it tastes good but he must not.

customer_reviews.text: for some reason, my kid doesn't like this....don't know if it's the brand or the flavor selection. but my younger one eats it, but that one eats anything.

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to get Fruit and Veggies
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It's a simple snack on the go that is both tasty and good for her. It's an easy way to get fruit and veggies in her diet. I highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Taste horrible
customer_reviews.text: It has great vitamins but taste horrible. My kid thew up with one spoon amount of it. I taste any food before giving to my kids and I hated it too.

product_meta.title: Plum Organics Stage 2, Organic Baby Food, Pear, Spinach and Pea, 4 Ounce pouches (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description: Style:Pack of 12| Flavor:Pear, Spinach & Pea| Size:4 Ounce (Pack of 12)Stage 2 Fruit & Veggies (6+ months) is perfect for exposing your little foodie to unique flavors and colors. Using only organic ingredients, the blend is in a convenient, resealable pouch that’s perfect for flexible portions.
feature_bullets: Pack of twelve, 4 ounce (Total of 48 ounces)
Non-BPA packaging & child safe, recyclable cap
Convenient, re-sealable & portable pouch for on-the-go feeding

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
